criticism: Integer overflow in transfer and transferFrom functions allows attackers to set any user's balance, causing a potential DoS and exploitable in real world for a large amount of Ether.
Bad randomness in approveAndCall function allows attackers to cause a DoS.
Integer overflow in feeFor function allows attackers to cause a DoS.
Access control issue in IDXM constructor allows attackers to acquire all tokens, causing a potential exploitable in real world.
